author: andyc
msg: Updated some of the documentation to be inline with the current
Xerces2 design. More needs to be written.

author: andyc
msg: Locator object not passed to SAX1 DocumentHandler/SAX2
ContentHandler. This problem was actually in two parts:
1) The standard parser configuration was not setting
the parser could query the locator.
2) The SAX parser was not retrieving the locator in order
to pass it on the handlers.
